Core classes (Graphical User Interface)¶

QApplicationManager¶

Module QApplicationManager

Module for the main Graphical User Interface of RepTate. It is the GUI counterpart of ApplicationManager.

class RepTate.gui.QApplicationManager.QTextEditLogger(parent)[source]¶

Bases: logging.Handler

emit(record)[source]¶

Do whatever it takes to actually log the specified logging record.

This version is intended to be implemented by subclasses and so raises a NotImplementedError.

QApplicationWindow¶

Module QApplicationWindow

Module that defines the basic GUI class from which all GUI applications are derived. It is the GUI counterpart of Application.
